_comment: Problem states (hurdles) that differentiate integration pages. Each hurdle = a unique angle / search intent. Slug is used in URLs: /{vertical}/integration/{source}-to-{destination}/{hurdle}

logistics.name: GL Account Mapping
logistics.description: Normalizing general ledger account codes between logistics and ERP systems

logistics.name: Data Migration
logistics.description: Moving historical shipment and financial data to a new system

logistics.name: Format Normalization
logistics.description: Transforming non-standard document formats into system-ready structured data

logistics.name: Custom Field Mapping
logistics.description: Mapping proprietary fields between source and destination systems

logistics.name: Multi-Currency Handling
logistics.description: Converting and reconciling multi-currency freight and duty charges

logistics.name: Tax Compliance
logistics.description: Ensuring duty, VAT, and tax data is correctly formatted for compliance

logistics.name: Duplicate Detection
logistics.description: Identifying and removing duplicate shipment records across systems

logistics.name: EDI Translation
logistics.description: Converting EDI 850/810/214 transactions into readable business data

logistics.name: Legacy Data Cleanup
logistics.description: Cleaning and standardizing data from legacy or deprecated logistics systems

logistics.name: ISF / AMS Filing Prep
logistics.description: Preparing and formatting data for ISF and AMS customs pre-filing requirements

accountants.name: Chart of Accounts Mapping
accountants.description: Mapping client chart of accounts to a standard or destination system's COA

accountants.name: Tax Code Normalization
accountants.description: Standardizing tax codes and rates across multiple client entities

accountants.name: Client Data Migration
accountants.description: Moving client financial records from one software platform to another

accountants.name: Multi-Entity Consolidation
accountants.description: Consolidating financials across multiple client entities or subsidiaries

accountants.name: Payroll Sync
accountants.description: Synchronizing payroll data between HR and accounting systems

accountants.name: Document Digitization
accountants.description: Converting paper or scanned financial documents to structured digital data

accountants.name: Legacy Data Cleanup
accountants.description: Cleaning and standardizing data from outdated accounting software

accountants.name: Compliance Formatting
accountants.description: Formatting financial data to meet IRS, GAAP, or IFRS compliance requirements

accountants.name: Year-End Processing
accountants.description: Automating year-end document preparation, reconciliation, and filing workflows

accountants.name: Audit Trail Preparation
accountants.description: Structuring financial data to create a clean, traceable audit trail

real-estate.name: Lease Data Extraction
real-estate.description: Extracting tenant, term, rent, and clause data from lease PDFs

real-estate.name: Rent Roll Normalization
real-estate.description: Standardizing rent roll formats across multiple properties or management companies

real-estate.name: Tenant Record Migration
real-estate.description: Moving tenant records and payment history between property management platforms

real-estate.name: CAM Reconciliation
real-estate.description: Calculating and reconciling Common Area Maintenance charges from operating expense data

real-estate.name: Document Digitization
real-estate.description: Converting paper leases, applications, and title documents to structured digital records

real-estate.name: Legacy Software Migration
real-estate.description: Migrating data from outdated property management software to modern platforms

real-estate.name: Multi-Property Consolidation
real-estate.description: Consolidating data from multiple properties into a single reporting view

real-estate.name: Compliance Formatting
real-estate.description: Formatting property and tenant data for HUD, LIHTC, or local regulatory compliance

real-estate.name: Maintenance Data Sync
real-estate.description: Syncing work order and maintenance invoice data to accounting and reporting systems

real-estate.name: Title Document Processing
real-estate.description: Extracting and structuring data from title reports and closing disclosures

warehousing.name: SKU Normalization
warehousing.description: Standardizing SKU formats and product identifiers across WMS and ERP systems

warehousing.name: Inventory Reconciliation
warehousing.description: Reconciling physical inventory counts with WMS and ERP records

warehousing.name: Multi-Location Sync
warehousing.description: Synchronizing inventory levels across multiple warehouse locations or 3PL partners

warehousing.name: ERP Data Migration
warehousing.description: Migrating inventory and order data from legacy WMS to a new ERP platform

warehousing.name: Order Management Integration
warehousing.description: Connecting order intake, fulfillment, and shipping data between systems

warehousing.name: Returns Processing
warehousing.description: Automating the capture and processing of RMAs and return authorization documents

warehousing.name: Supplier Data Mapping
warehousing.description: Mapping supplier codes, lead times, and contact data between procurement and WMS systems

warehousing.name: Cycle Count Automation
warehousing.description: Automating cycle count data capture and variance reporting

warehousing.name: Barcode Standardization
warehousing.description: Normalizing barcode formats (GS1, SSCC, UPC) across fulfillment and receiving workflows

warehousing.name: 3PL Data Exchange
warehousing.description: Standardizing data formats for sharing inventory and order data with 3PL partners
